channel.title: Manually Enter IP Information
channel.description: This form allows you to manually enter all your IP configuration. A valid IP address is required if you want to access the NCL Club repository or start a SSH server.

item.title: IP Address
item.description: Host IP Address. Use the following format: 999.999.999.999

item.title: Network Mask
item.description: Network Mask. Use the following format: 999.999.999.999

item.title: Gateway
item.description: Default Gateway. Use the following format: 999.999.999.999

item.title: DNS Server
item.description: DNS Server. Use the following format: 999.999.999.999

item.title: > Apply changes
item.description: Press [Enter] to apply your IP changes.
